title: Online Safety and Media Regulation Act 2022 (No. 41 of 2022)), hereby order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Broadcasting Act 2009 (Establishment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Broadcasting Act 2009 (Establishment 

Day) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited broadcasting act 2009 (establishment day) order 2023

title: Online Safety and Media Regulation Act 2022 (No. 41 of 2022)), hereby order
heading: 2. The 15th day of March 2023 is appointed to be the establishment day
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of March 2023 is appointed to be the establishment day 

for the purposes of the Broadcasting Act 2009 (No. 18 of 2009). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 February, 2023. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [72] 3
